title: Watch now: Fantasy Football Live is back for Week 10
description: Yahoo Sports' fantasy analysts cover the breaking news, important injuries and help managers set their lineups. Use #askFFL on social to interact with the show.
author: Yahoo Sports Videos
excerpt: Yahoo Sports' Fantasy Football Live crew covers the breaking news, important injuries and helps managers set their lineups for Week 10 of the 2024 NFL season...
text:
Yahoo Sports VideosYahoo Sports VideosThu, Nov 7, 2024, 11:00 AMYahoo Sports' Fantasy Football Live crew covers the breaking news, important injuries and helps managers set their lineups for Week 10 of the 2024 NFL season. Contact our experts during the show @YahooFantasy using the hashtag #askFFL with your questions.Fantasy Football LiveYahoo Sports' Fantasy Football Live crew covers the breaking news, important injuries and helps managers set their lineups for Week 10 of the 2024 NFL season. Contact our experts during the show @YahooFantasy using the hashtag #askFFL with your questions.Now PlayingPausedDo the Suns have a better shot at the NBA Finals than the Thunder?

Yahoo Sports NBA contributing writer Tom Haberstroh and senior NBA writer Dan Devine break down the Phoenix Suns performance so far this season and debate whether or not the Suns could take down the Oklahoma City Thunder. Hear the full conversation on “The Big Number” and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.

2:21Now PlayingPausedWhy Florida is sticking with Billy Napier as head coach

Yahoo Sports national columnist Dan Wetzel, senior college sports reporter Ross Dellenger and Sports Illustrated’s Pat Forde discuss Florida's decision to retain Billy Napier as the head football coach of the program. Hear the full conversation on the “College Football Enquirer” podcast - and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.

2:09Now PlayingPausedCan the Texans slow down the Lions offense?

Yahoo Sports NFL analyst Nate Tice and NFL writer Charles McDonald discuss whether the Texans defense can stop the explosive Lions offense to pull an upset in Week 10. Hear the full conversation on “Football 301” - and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.

2:01Now PlayingPausedWhy Roki Sasaki could make this winter’s biggest MLB splash

Yahoo Sports senior MLB analysts Jake Mintz and Jordan Shusterman discuss the 23-year-old pitcher’s decision to potentially make the jump to Major League Baseball and why he is the best pitching phenom in years. Hear the full conversation on the “Baseball Bar-B-Cast” podcast - and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.

2:44Now PlayingPausedUFC Fight Night: Magny vs. Prates preview

“The Boys In The Back” crew looks ahead to Saturday night’s fight card at the UFC APEX.

2:45Now PlayingPausedZa'Darius Smith lifts the Lions - but should Detroit have done more?

Yahoo Sports’ Jason Fitz, senior NFL writer Frank Schwab and senior NFL reporter Jori Epstein discuss Detroit's moves at the NFL trade deadline and if the NFC leaders did enough. Hear the full conversation on “Inside Coverage” - and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.

2:02Now PlayingPausedWhat have we learned from 100 UFC Fight Nights?

Yahoo Sports MMA contributor Ben Fowlkes reflects on UFC's Fight Night and what it's meant to fighters, the promotion and fans.

1:45Now PlayingPausedWill Zion Williamson ever be in top shape?

Yahoo Sports senior NBA reporter Vincent Goodwill and basketball analyst Isis "Ice" Young react to news that the New Orleans star is dealing with a hamstring injury and question whether the Pelicans power forward will ever reach his peak physical potential. Hear the full conversation on “Good Word with Goodwill” and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.

1:59Now PlayingPaused

Yahoo Sports' Fantasy Football Live crew covers the breaking news, important injuries and helps managers set their lineups for Week 10 of the 2024 NFL season. Contact our experts during the show @YahooFantasy using the hashtag #askFFL with your questions.
